title: Furniture Clinic Stove Restorer - Restores The Natural Matt Black Colour on Log Burners, Grates, & Fireplaces. Works Like a Polish - 250ml
features: STOVE RESTORER: Restores the colour of black metal with just one application, producing a natural finish and covers faded and worn areas.
EASY TO USE: Using a sponge, simply rub the Stove Restorer into the metal, polsih off and light stove to cure, then your wood burning stove is restored.
SAFE TO USE: Our Stove Restorer is non-toxic and non-flammable and is very low odour. Once applied, and dried (10 mins), it will not flake or peel off and can withstand extremely high temperatures.

SUITABLE FOR: The Stove Restorer is an all-in-one Stove Paint and Stove Polish that can be used safely on all black log burners, fireplaces, grates and fireside accessories. It can also be used on all types of metal, including cast iron.
ESSENTIAL LOG BURNER ACCESSORIES: Before using our Stove Restorer, use our Stove Glass & Metal Cleaner to clean the glass and metal of your wood burner. Or upgrade to our money-saving Stove Care Kit.
description: Product Description Stove Restorer Our Stove Restorer is an easy-to-use alternative to Stove Paint that puts the black back into all log burners, grates, and fireplaces. Simply rub the Stove Restorer into the metal, polish off, and light the stove to cure. Your stove will then be restored. The Stove Restorer produces a lovely, natural finish, restoring the black colour with just one simple application. It's much easier to use than Stove Paint and produces incredibly similar results covering faded and worn areas of metal. Unlike Stove Paint, it is non-toxic and non-flammable, and is very low odour. Once opened, use within 1 year. The benefits: Restores the natural matt black look Covers faded and worn patches Works like polish – rub in and buff off Instant results with one application Easy to use alternative to stove paint Low odour, so no fumes when applying or curing For log burners, grates, Fireplace Spark Guards, and fireplaces Stove Cleaner Stove Care Kit Cleaning Brush Sponge & Applicator Bundle Add To Basket Add To Basket Add To Basket Add To Basket Customer Reviews 4.4 out of 5 stars 1,755 4.4 out of 5 stars 1,755 4.4 out of 5 stars 510 4.4 out of 5 stars 501 Price £9.99 £ 9 . 99 £21.99 £ 21 . 99 £5.02 £ 5 . 02 £6.99 £ 6 . 99 Alternative Products Removes soot and dirt from all metal and glass wood burning stoves. Contains Stove Cleaner, Stove Restorer and applicators. This soft bristled brush this brush makes quick work of cleaning. 5 Cleaning Sponges and 2 Applicator Sponges.
